content.question: Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The mass of the sphere is greater than the mass of the block.
The mass of the sphere is equal to the mass of the block.
The weight of the sphere is greater than the component of the block’s weight along the ramp.
The weight of the sphere is less than the component of the block’s weight along the ramp.

content.answer: The weight of the sphere is less than the component of the block’s weight along the ramp.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
